description: This file sets up a knowledge base using a PDF URL, integrates it with an agent, and executes a query to generate a response about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base class that loads PDF content from URLs and integrates with vector database.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class that interacts with the knowledge base and performs actions like generating responses.

classes.name: Llama
classes.description: A model class representing the Llama language model used by the agent.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class representing a vector database interface using pgvector.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Generates and prints a response to a given prompt, optionally in markdown format.
